title: Creme Fraiche: Buying and Making

items.name: Store-bought
items.details: Available at many grocery stores, usually found near the sour cream or specialty dairy products section.

items.name: Homemade alternative
items.details: Mix heavy cream with a bit of buttermilk and let it sit at room temperature until thickened (usually 12-24 hours).

notes: If you cannot find creme fraiche in the dairy aisle, check the specialty cheese or international foods section. Making it at home requires only heavy cream and buttermilk.
